msg: This is an empty revision for padding.
This is an empty revision for padding.

author: gstein
msg: Add the ability to have templates for specifying the on-disk structure
of a repository directory. Also updated the API to enable a future
template for in-repository structures. Removed the notion of a
configuration directory from the repository API since SVN doesn't
actually use that at all.
Note: I don't think this is going to work too well on Windows right
now. Need to figure out the right default for the template path.
* configure.in: get SVN_TEMPLATE_ROOT_DIR defined in
svn_private_config.h. based on the datadir for now.
* svn_private_config.hw
(SVN_TEMPLATE_ROOT_DIR): new symbol
* include/svn_repos.h
(svn_repos_create): add two new params to specify templates
(svn_repos_conf_dir): removed
* tests/fs-helpers.c
(svn_test__create_repos): pass NULL for the template args
* libsvn_repos/repos.c
(DEFAULT_TEMPLATE_NAME): specify the name of the default template
(svn_repos_conf_dir): removed
(create_repos_dir): new function to create a repository directory,
with a little better error feedback. based on code from the old
svn_repos_create.
(create_locks): use create_repos_dir instead of svn_io_dir_make
(create_hooks): ditto
(init_repos_dirs): do not initialize ->conf_path
(create_repos_structure): factored out of the old svn_repos_create.
it is the hard-coded fallback for constructing a repos dir. there
are no resultant changes from before, except for the elimination
of the conf dir. the DAV dir construction now uses
create_repos_dir instead of svn_io_dir_make.
(struct copy_ctx_t): new baton structure
(copy_structure): new walker callback for copying a template tree
into the repository tree.
(svn_repos_create): take two new params. attempt to copy the
specified template (name or path), or to use the default. failing
all that, use the hard-coded fallback. the directory for the
templates is specified as "[miscellany].template_root" in the
config file / registry, or with the compiled-in default.
* libsvn_repos/repos.h
(SVN_REPOS__CONF_DIR): removed
(struct svn_repos_t): conf_path member removed
* svnadmin/main.c
(enum <unnamed>): removed svnadmin__long_output, as it is no longer
used. added svnadmin__on_disk_template and
svnadmin__in_repos_template
(options_table[]): added help strings for the new switches
(cmd_table[]): add new switches to 'svnadmin create'
(struct svnadmin_opt_state): add on_disk and in_repos members to
hold the templates from the cmdline.
(main): store the templates into the option state

author: rooneg
msg: * doc/doxygen.conf
(ENUM_VALUES_PER_LINE): set to 1, since the default of 4 makes a lot of
our docs pretty much unreadable.
(MACRO_EXPANSION): turn on, so SVN_ERRDEF will be expanded properly.
* subversion/include/svn_error_codes.h
(SVN_ERRDEF): in the !SVN_ERROR_ENUM_DEFINED case, use the STR argument
to populate a doxygen comment for the entry in the enum.
(SVN_ERR_CATEGORY_SIZE, SVN_ERR_*_CATEGORY_START): ifndef out in the
doxygen case since they are an implementation detail, and they don't
come out looking very useful in doxygen's output anyway.

author: rooneg
msg: * subversion/include/svn_io.h
(svn_io_stat): let doxygen process this comment.
* subversion/include/svn_md5.h
(svn_md5_empty_string_digest): let doxygen process this comment.
(svn_md5_digest_to_cstring): make this comment into one sentence so that
there isn't a semi-useless detailed description.
(svn_md5_digests_match): let doxygen process this comment.
* subversion/include/svn_path.h
(svn_path_basename): convert some argument names i missed in the first pass
over to doxygen style.
* subversion/include/svn_utf.h
(svn_utf_cstring_from_utf8_fuzzy): convert an argument name i missed over
to doxygen style.
